result.eng: There is no easy cure for cancer.

result.eng: He didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.
result.ga: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteach

result.eng: It seems that it will be easy.

result.eng: Cavan had an easy victory over the Antrim team.

result.eng: It's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
